org.pipservices3.commons.config.ConfigParams

Packages that use ConfigParams
Package Description

  • Uses of ConfigParams in org.pipservices3.commons.config

    Methods in org.pipservices3.commons.config that return ConfigParams
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static ConfigParams ConfigParams.fromString​(String line)
    Creates a new ConfigParams object filled with key-value pairs serialized as a string.
    static ConfigParams ConfigParams.fromTuples​(Object... tuples)
    Creates a new ConfigParams object filled with provided key-value pairs called tuples.
    static ConfigParams ConfigParams.fromValue​(Object value)
    Creates a new ConfigParams object filled with key-value pairs from specified object.
    ConfigParams ConfigParams.getSection​(String section)
    Gets parameters from specific section stored in this ConfigMap.
    static ConfigParams ConfigParams.mergeConfigs​(ConfigParams... configs)
    Merges two or more ConfigParams into one.
    ConfigParams ConfigParams.override​(ConfigParams configParams)
    Overrides parameters with new values from specified ConfigParams and returns a new ConfigParams object.
    static ConfigParams OptionResolver.resolve​(ConfigParams config, boolean configAsDefault)
    Resolves an "options" configuration section from component configuration parameters.
    ConfigParams ConfigParams.setDefaults​(ConfigParams defaultConfigParams)
    Set default values from specified ConfigParams and returns a new ConfigParams object.
    Methods in org.pipservices3.commons.config with parameters of type ConfigParams
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void ConfigParams.addSection​(String section, ConfigParams sectionParams)
    Adds parameters into this ConfigParams under specified section.
    void IConfigurable.configure​(ConfigParams config)
    Configures object by passing configuration parameters.
    static ConfigParams ConfigParams.mergeConfigs​(ConfigParams... configs)
    Merges two or more ConfigParams into one.
    ConfigParams ConfigParams.override​(ConfigParams configParams)
    Overrides parameters with new values from specified ConfigParams and returns a new ConfigParams object.
    static String NameResolver.resolve​(ConfigParams config, String defaultName)
    Resolves a component name from configuration parameters.
    static ConfigParams OptionResolver.resolve​(ConfigParams config, boolean configAsDefault)
    Resolves an "options" configuration section from component configuration parameters.
    ConfigParams ConfigParams.setDefaults​(ConfigParams defaultConfigParams)
    Set default values from specified ConfigParams and returns a new ConfigParams object.
